content.c_venueAddress: St Martin's Ln, Charing Cross, London WC2N 4BG
content.name: An Enemy of the People

primaryPhoto.description:
Nominated for Best Actor in a Supporting Role (Paul Hilton) and Best Actress in a Supporting Role (Priyanga Burford) at the Olivier Awards 2024
Making his West End debut, celebrated director Thomas Ostermeier‘s iconoclastic production of AN ENEMY OF THE PEOPLE premieres at the Duke of York’s Theatre for a strictly limited run.
Matt Smith stars in the critically acclaimed AN ENEMY OF THE PEOPLE, Thomas Ostermeier’s bold reimagining of the classic play by Henrik Ibsen.
Joining Matt Smith as Dr. Stockmann are Jessica Brown Findlay as Katharina Stockmann, Priyanga Burford as Aslaksen, Zachary Hart as Billing, Paul Hilton as Peter Stockmann, Nigel Lindsay as Morten Kiil and Shubham Saraf as Hovstad.
Doubt spreads faster than disease in Ibsen’s thought-provoking play about truth in a society driven by power and money.
These two worlds are about to collide with dizzying consequences…..
Book your AN ENEMY OF THE PEOPLE theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
